statements: SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, location FROM properties WHERE price < 1000 AND availability = true;
SELECT DISTINCT property_type FROM properties;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT property_name, property_type, location FROM properties WHERE availability = true
SELECT property_id, property_name, price FROM properties WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties WHERE availability = false ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT property_id, property_name, price, availability FROM properties
SELECT * FROM rental_properties ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_price FROM rental_properties WHERE property_price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT comparison_id, market_price, comparison_date FROM market_comparison ORDER BY comparison_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location = 'New York' ORDER BY property_price DESC;

SELECT property_name, property_location, market_price FROM rental_properties INNER JOIN market_comparison ON rental_properties.property_id = market_comparison.property_id WHERE market_price > 2000 AND comparison_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_location, property_price FROM rental_properties WHERE property_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago') AND property_price < 2000;

SELECT property_id, property_name, property_price, comparison_date FROM rental_properties LEFT JOIN market_comparison ON rental_properties.property_id = market_comparison.property_id WHERE market_price IS NULL ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_availability;
SELECT property_name, city FROM property_availability WHERE available_units > 0;
SELECT property_id, price_per_unit FROM property_availability ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC;
SELECT property_name, price_per_unit, available_units FROM property_availability WHERE city='New York';
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, rental_price FROM rental_history WHERE rental_price >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM property_availability WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, rental_duration FROM rental_history WHERE rental_price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, city, available_units FROM property_availability WHERE available_units < 5 AND city = 'San Francisco';

SELECT property_id, property_name, price_per_unit FROM property_availability INNER JOIN market_comparison ON property_availability.property_id = market_comparison.property_id WHERE market_average_price > price_per_unit;
SELECT comparison_id, property_id, market_rental_price FROM market_comparison WHERE market_rental_price = (SELECT MAX(market_rental_price) FROM market_comparison);
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT listing_id, property_type, address FROM property_listings WHERE rental_price < 2000;
SELECT listing_id, address, availability_date FROM property_listings WHERE availability_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM property_owners;
SELECT comparison_id, property_type, rental_price, market_average_price FROM market_comparison WHERE rental_price > market_average_price;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE rental_price > 2000 ORDER BY availability_date DESC;
SELECT rental_id, listing_id, rental_date FROM rental_history WHERE rental_price < 1500 AND rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT pl.address, rh.rental_price, mc.market_average_price FROM property_listings pl JOIN rental_history rh ON pl.listing_id = rh.listing_id JOIN market_comparison mc ON pl.property_type = mc.property_type WHERE rh.rental_price > mc.market_average_price ORDER BY rh.rental_price ASC;

SELECT pc.property_type, COUNT(DISTINCT pc.rental_price) AS unique_rental_prices FROM property_listings pl JOIN market_comparison pc ON pl.property_type = pc.property_type GROUP BY pc.property_type HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pc.rental_price) > 3;

SELECT po.owner_name, po.contact_email, pl.address, rh.rental_date FROM property_owners po JOIN property_listings pl on po.owner_id = pl.listing_id JOIN rental_history rh ON pl.listing_id = rh.listing_id WHERE rh.rental_date < '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT id, address, city, state, zip_code FROM rental_properties WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT rent_price, address, city FROM rental_properties WHERE rent_price > 1500;
SELECT * FROM market_comparison ORDER BY market_comparison_date DESC;
SELECT address, city, state, zip_code FROM rental_properties WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE city = 'New York' AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT address, city, state, rent_price FROM rental_properties WHERE rent_price > 2000;
SELECT * FROM market_comparison WHERE market_rent_price <= 1500 AND market_comparison_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, users.email, property_reviews.rating FROM users JOIN property_reviews ON users.id = property_reviews.user_id;

SELECT rental_properties.address, rental_properties.city, rental_properties.zip_code, property_reviews.rating FROM rental_properties JOIN property_reviews ON rental_properties.id = property_reviews.property_id WHERE property_reviews.rating >= 4;
